bro rata  purama muslim palli wala kadu thiyanawa  kiyala kawda kiwwe. palli 2 kin witharai kadu hamba une. wisheshayen me praharayen passe sodisi kale muslim janathawa inna gam. ethakota media e gewal walin kadu hamba unama e game thiyana muslim palliyath gawa gannawa. ai nam media kiyanneth tharagakari ayathanayak.  e gollo media wala news hadanne minissunta balanna asa hithena ewa dala.  lagakadith lidakin  kadu hamba unama godak popular media kiwwe muslim palliya laga thiyana lida kiyala. habai muslim palliyata wada lagin thibbe r.premadasa grounds eka. habai media kiwwe nane stadium eka gawa linda kiyala. ekata hethuwa thamai ehema kiyala wadak nathi eka . muslim palliya kiyapu gaman minissu balanawa media ekata oneth eka thama. muslim samajaya gana godak boru kathakatha pathirila thiyenne. namuth ewa oppu karanna sakshi nathi nisa  thamai usawi wala nadu naththe. man oyata reply kale oya dana ganna one nisa pamanai monahari pashna thiyanawanam magen ahanna . thanks bro
